General.Name: GTI Resources Ltd
General.Description: GTI Energy Ltd explores for mineral tenements in Wyoming and Utah. It holds interests in various properties located in the Great Divide Basin and Green Mountain, Wyoming, the United States; uranium and vanadium project located in the Henry Mountains, Utah; and the Lo Herma project located in Wyoming's prolific Powder River Basin uranium district. The company was formerly known as GTI Resources Limited and changed its name to GTI Energy Ltd in May 2022. GTI Energy Ltd was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Perth, Australia.
